name: WeirdSpace
description:
You are traversing the space on your cozy ship, when suddenly your sophisticated spaceship sensors detected that the gravity phenomena has disappeared and now your ship isn't being attracted to the nearby planets. This means of course that if the objects don't follow the intended trajectory, the universe will collapse! Help the crew members save the universe from collapsing by steering the spaceship as if it was affected by the gravity!

Controls: WASD (and perhaps also gamepad stick)
